mapper.select: select ID, OPER, POSTCODE, TOKEN, OPENFLAG, COUNTRYCODE, POSTCODE1, ACCOUNT, DISTRICT, FAX, ACCOUNTNICK, CITY, COMPANY, TOKEN1, TOKEN2, FIRSTNAME, TEL, LASTNAME, PROVINCE, FLAG1, ADDRESS1, EMAIL, TOKEN3, FLAG2, COUNTRY, PWD, OPERTIME, ADDRESS, ACCOUNTTYPE, FLAG3, FLAG, SENDER, APIID, ORDERTYPE from DB_EXPRESSAPIUSER where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
